original_text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ:
korean_text: 또 그 안에서 너희가 손으로 하지 아니한 할례를 받았으니 곧 육의 몸을 벗는 것이요 그리스도의 할례니라

sentences.original_text: In whom also ye are circumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 또한 그 안에서 할례를 받았고

sentences.original_text: with the circumcision made without hands
in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh
